All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Apple
Special entity sub-class for th apple.
BoxCollider
Sub-class of Entity that allows for checking collisions and identifier.
BoxCollider.ID
 
BreakableCrate
 
ButtonListener
Class for handling events triggered by JButtons in the game.
CloseClipWhenDone
Sub-class of LineListener for closing file after playing.
ColliderGroup
Class for handling a group of BoxColliders.
Crate
 
Empty
Empty object.
Entity
Base class of all game objects.
EntityChain
A chain of entity objects like a linked list.
Game
Game class for creating ang managing the game's logic.
GameFont
Class for creating and deriving game-specific fonts.
GameManager
Helper class for the Game which allows switching of screens based on the current game state.
GameStates
 
GUI
Sub-class of JPanel that allows for more efficient management.
GUIFactory
Factory class for statically generating each GUI used in the game.
Input
Handles game keyboard inputs.
Level
Manages level resources imports and allows for dynamic switching in game level and resetting it.
LevelLoader
Manages level resources from files and appends the correct images to each object.
Main
 
Ramen
 
Snake
Contains all useful methods for dealing with the snake in the game.
Sound
Class used for importing audio resources used in game.
SoundManager
Class for managing Sound objects.
SpikeBall
 
Star
 
Vector2D
Custom Vector class for dealing with game coordinates.
Window
Sub-class of JFrame.
